= GNIS feature ID | blank1_info = 1267610 | website = City of Valley Springs, South Dakota | footnotes = }} Valley Springs is a city in the eastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is located in Minnehaha County along the Minnesota state line. Valley Springs became a city in 1879, and 885 people lived there at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== *City of Valley Springs website Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1879 establishments in Dakota Territory
